title: Schindler - revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: Overall Revenue in billion Swiss francs has increased over the Year.
Revenue in billion Swiss francs is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2007 and 2008.
The highest Revenue in billion Swiss francs, of value 14.0 was reached at Year 2008
Minimum Revenue in billion Swiss francs about 13.8 was reached at Year 2007
min_summary: In general Revenue in billion Swiss francs has stayed the same over the Year.
Revenue in billion Swiss francs is slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008.
